# PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions

**Structure**

These constants specify mutability options in property lists.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MutabilityOptions
```

## Constants

- **mutableContainers**: Causes the returned property list to have mutable containers but immutable leaves.
- **mutableContainersAndLeaves**: Causes the returned property list to have mutable containers and leaves.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat**: These constants are used to specify a property list serialization format.
- **PropertyListSerialization.ReadOptions**: The only read options supported are described in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PropertyListSerialization/MutabilityOptions].

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
